findings.title: Block timestamp
findings.description: Dangerous usage of block.timestamp. block.timestamp can be manipulated by miners within 15 minutes.
findings.function: initializeBondTerms, setAdjustment, deposit, adjust, bondPrice, percentVestedFor

findings.title: Boolean equality
findings.description: Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.

findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.
